text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/credentialstatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
active activeThe credential may be considered valid for use.
inactive inactiveThe credential may not be considered valid for use.
issued-in-error issued in errorThe credential was mistakenly assigned and should not be considered valid for use.
revoked revokedThe credential was revoked by the issuing organization and should not be considered valid for use.
pending pendingThe credential has not been officially assigned. It may or may not be considered valid for use.
unknown unknownThe status of this credential is unknown. It may or may not be considered valid for use.

name: VhDirCredentialStatus
title: VhDir Credential Status Code System
publisher: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

description: This code system contains codes for indicating the status of a credential, such as an identifier or qualification.
copyright: Used by permission of HL7 International all rights reserved Creative Commons License

concept.definition: The credential may be considered valid for use.
The credential may not be considered valid for use.
The credential was mistakenly assigned and should not be considered valid for use.
The credential was revoked by the issuing organization and should not be considered valid for use.
The credential has not been officially assigned. It may or may not be considered valid for use.
The status of this credential is unknown. It may or may not be considered valid for use.
